name: dpos-token
description: A repository for DPOS token initialization and distribution

scripts.solidity-docgen: rm -rf docs/docs/api* && npm i && SOLC_ARGS='openzeppelin-solidity=`pwd`/node_modules/openzeppelin-solidity' solidity-docgen --exclude Token/ERC677.sol,Migrations.sol,Token/Sacrifice.sol . contracts docs && node docs/website/sidebars-fix.js
scripts.docs-start: npm run solidity-docgen && cd docs/website && npm i && npm start
scripts.docs-publish: npm run solidity-docgen && cd docs/website && npm i && npm run publish-gh-pages
